comments:
The following occurs when focus is taken away from our TextCellEditor by clicking on an 
object outside of it.

java.version=1.4.1_01
java.vendor=Apple Computer, Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=macosx, ARCH=ppc, WS=carbon, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments: -pdelaunch -dev bin -os macosx -ws carbon -arch ppc -nl 
en_US
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Feb 03, 2004 14:00:25.606
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Feb 03, 2004 14:00:25.609
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
